item.title: Inauguration Day in America | CBS News Special Report
item.description: CBS News brings you top moments and takeaways from President Trump's inauguration and looks ahead to his second term in office in this special report.

item.title: Fire at Turkish ski resort kills least 10 people, injures dozens more
item.description: Witnesses say guests at a ski resort hotel in Turkey tried to escape a fire that killed at least 10 people with ropes and sheets hung from windows.

item.title: Journalist shot dead, prosecutor's office bombed in Peru
item.description: Gaston Medina previously told the Committee to Protect Journalists he received death threats related to his reporting.

item.title: Ryan Corbett's family say he's been freed in U.S.-Taliban prisoner swap
item.description: Afghanistan's Taliban government announced the release of 2 Americans in a prisoner exchange. Ryan Corbett's family says he's one of them.

item.title: Border Patrol agent shot dead on Vermont highway, near Canadian border
item.description: A U.S. Border Patrol agent was fatally shot on a highway in northern Vermont south of the Canadian border, authorities said.
